content.rendered:
Creators Irma Correa. Ece Yörenç

Directed by Liliana Bocanegra. Humberto Miró. Sasha Politoff

Written by Irma Correa. Ece Yörenç. Joaquín Santamaría

Cast Megan Montaner( Emma7 episodes, 2022 ). Miquel Fernández( Nando7 episodes, 2022 ). Irina Bravo(7 episodes, 2022 ). Boré Buika(7 episodes, 2022 ). Jael Pascual(7 episodes, 2022 ). Eduardo Lloveras(6 episodes, 2022 ). Pablo Escamilla(6 episodes, 2022 ). Gonzalo Caps( Sergio5 episodes, 2022 ). Cristina Kovani(5 episodes, 2022 ). Andrea Tivadar( Anna4 episodes, 2022 ). Michel Noher( Rubén2 episodes, 2022 ). Inma Sancho(2 episodes, 2022 ). Amber Shana Williams( Samantha1 episode, 2022 ). Mirela Balic(1 episode, 2022 ). Daniel Horvath( Dimitri1 episode, 2022 ). Ferran Rañé(1 episode, 2022 ). Álvaro Sanz Rodríguez( Nando Niño1 episode, 2022 ). Maika Barroso(1 episode, 2022 ). Daniela Soneira(1 episode, 2022 ). Raúl Escudero( Juan1 episode, 2022 ).Ana Iglesias

Language Spanish

Producers Humberto Miró

Production Boomerang TV.

Official site Netflix Site

Season 1

Total Episodes 8
